unnormalised: Borem, konnem tori Bharotantlea AI chea fuddara vixim vicharlem. Tem ek dam aschर्यachें prashn, ani sachin, bhov thoddem utsahachê, punn kharê sambhav'yatayuy asa. Mhaka dista amî AI soglleanî ekîkrit kartole, krixi thaun dhôktôrachya seva poryant. Mazo bhau TCS-ant kam korta ani to sangta tim kornnanchi utpadakta andaz korpak AI vapurtat- dista tim 15% odik nêmtikay mellvitat.
normalised: Bore, konnen tori Bharatantlya A-I chea fuddara vixim vicharlem. Tem ekdam bore vatten vixim axa ani khorench sangtam zalear, khub dhobleponn asa, punn khorench xokiotai asa. Mhaka dista ami A-I soglleant misoll'llelem polletlim, xetkamantlean dhaktori seve meren. Mhozo cousin T-C-S hanga kam karta ani to sangta te poilech A-I vaprun pikachi upoz zatelim oxi bazu zoddtait - dix'ttechem pandhra tokke odik borobor mellta.

unnormalised: Dhôktôrachya seva dusri vhoddli vostu. Kalpana kara AI dhôktrank lokar rogachên nidan korunk madat karta. Hanvem kitem tori vachlem ki AIIMS MRI scan-an thaun cancer zôkhunk algoritma prêyog korta. Ani grahak seva vixim vichar kara! 30 minitam phone-cher ravunk naka- AI chatbot bhov routine vostunchin samhall shakta. Konnain mhaka sanglem ki HDFC Bank grahakanchea vicharanchi takaz korpak AI system test karta... Tim sangtat ki tem ravpacho vell 50% korun kami kartat.
normalised: Dhaktori seva anik ek vhodd vixo. A-I doctorank rogainchi poilim nirikxa korunk modot karta mhonn xokta kai kalpna korat. Hanvem konnaitoim vachlem ki A-I-I-M-S M-R-I skenantlean kensir nirikxa korunk algorithem vaprun prayog kortat. Ani customer sevechem chintun polleiat! Fonnacher tis minutam meren ravonk lagona - A-I chatbot porichem khub kam korunk xokta. Konnen tori mhaka sanglen ki H-D-F-C Bank customer prashnanchea nirvahnacher A-I sistem porixa korta... Te sangtat tem ravonk lagcho vell pandhra tokke kam korta mhonnun.

unnormalised: Pun punn thoddi avhanuy asat, nahi? Mahitichi gupta ek vhoddli dukhnni. Amin AI nîtik ani jababdarik vaprunk zai kasa tem shodhun kadhunk zai. Ani tem sogllem nokri nashtô zallachem asa. Kitem zata jevna AI 10 lokanchi kamai korunk shakta? Sarkarak training progra vixim ani novi sandhi utponn korpak chintunk zai. Ek navin ahvalan utlekh kelo ki 2 million nokreo jokhmaant astole.
normalised: Punn addchanio asa, sarkhem? Data guptponn ek vhodd chikotsa asa. A-I niti ani zobabdaren koxem vaprunk zata tem ami sodun kaddpachi goroz asa. Ani akhi nokri vevasthapnichi vostu asa. A-I ten zannanchem kam korunk xakta tedna kitem zatolem? Sarkaran punorutpadna progremani ani nove sandi utpon korpak chintunk goroz asa. Eka navea riportant don million nokri dhok'keak yetalim mhonnun ul'lek kel'lo asa.

unnormalised: Soglleanî, hanv achavadi. AI koddlean Bharotak boreak rupantor korpachi sambhav'yata asa, punn amî hoshiar zavnk zai. Nirpeksh povitrai, kushlatachyo khanti bhôrop ani naitik rakshonn mhukhar aslô zai. Ami asha kartolyam ki tem soglleank ek borem fuddar mellvônk kartolem! Kiteak 2030 vorosan vostu bhov veglliyo distole.
normalised: Overall, hanv axavadi asa. A-I Bharatant boreponnak rupantar korpak xokta, punn ami huxar ravpachi goroz asa. Saman ponnan mellonk divop, hunnaracho ontor nirvarop ani niti surkxa poile vattent asunk zai. Ami axa kortam tem soglleank bore fuddarak vheuncho! Don hozar ani tis meren vostu khub veglleo distolim.
